Package simpleGUI.utilities

Class Clock

java.lang.Object
simpleGUI.utilities.Clock
public class Clock extends Object
A clock that can be attached to a Frame.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    (package private) boolean
    digitalView
    Define if the clock should be displayed as digital (true) or analog (false).

    The height of the Clock in pixels.

    owner

    The width of the Clock in pixels.

  • Constructor Details

    • Clock

      public Clock()
      Constructor. Create an empty PictureViewer that is not connected to an owner frame, and do not have a size.

    • Clock

      public Clock(Frame owner)
      Constructor. Setting the height to 150px and width to 150px by default, and the view as digital.
      Parameters:
      owner - The Frame that hold the Clock.

    • Clock

      public Clock(Frame owner, boolean digitalView)
      Constructor. Setting the height to 150px and width to 150px by default.
      Parameters:
      owner - The Frame that hold the Clock.
      digitalView - Define if the clock should be displayed as digital (true) or analog (false).

    • Clock

      public Clock(Frame owner, boolean digitalView, int heightInPixels, int widthInPixels)
      Constructor.
      Parameters:
      owner - The Frame that hold the Clock.
      digitalView - Define if the clock should be displayed as digital (true) or analog (false).
      heightInPixels - The height of the Clock in pixels.
      widthInPixels - The width of the Clock in pixels.
